column3:
Nice!
utACK.

But this actually does not test the issue #7316, because the reported issue can only happen when you run bitcoin-qt with `-server=1`.

@jonasschnelli See my "test code" ;)

Are you still working on the `BITCOIND=bitcoin-qt` nightly rpc tests?
Concept ACK, but setting a timeout of 1 and then waiting a second is too close. A slight mistiming (e.g. busy machine) would result in a race condition, what about waiting 2 seconds instead?\n
Maybe this ought to actually try to do something to test the wallet relocking?\n
